documents.document:
AM I DEAD

why doesn't it work out?
the flow of living come my way again
so i can drink life be alive
learn to accept my sin

but instead i am dead
and i drink my own blood
dying wilting fading far away
lacking so much love

no one knows and no one would want to
i'm not even sure if i even do
all i know is that something's not right
and i'm not even sure that is true

i thought that i was once okay
someone special
but i was wrong
your eyes say i am no one

your voice sounds like
nails on a chalkboard
yet they are so beautiful as a
symphony of laughter

when you tell me i am no one
ugly unintelligent unloved worthless
undererving selfish
morally a bad person

it makes me feel so alive
but at the same time
DEAD
because when i hurt at least i feel
i have control i know im real

but deep inside
locked within my heart
i hold the secret that maybe
its okay that everything's not
falling apart

if maybe i refuse to listen
i could love myself more
i could believe that it's true
that i do deserve love repect
stability
but maybe every bad thing
was all because of me ..........

RAPE

My eye's are glassy
I'm losing control
the past keeps taking me
back to that world

You were my first
My fascination
the end of my world
in disguise of my best friend

Ocean blue eye's
dirty blond hair
you promised to love me
to always care

I looked up at your face
and saw your sweet smile
''it'll be all right
lets lay down for awhile''

''this won't hurt a bit
I swear that you'll love it
make it Worth my while
and I'll hole you for a while''

''Thats what you want isn't it
to be held?
well go through this pain then
it's only rape
you'll get used to it''

''No god please help me
it's not supposed to be this way
it's not supposed to hurt this much
oh please make him stop''

''whats the matter baby
don't you like what I have to give
if you don't like it
tough deal with it....''

Never had I felt such pain
been so used
felt such hatred
as I did that day

thirteen years old
grew up that day
never look back
you won't survive that way...

Don't feel sympathy. just watch who you trust. please just be careful who you decide to be with. Make sure you can trust them with your life before you go any farther.

What Matter'd Most

I thought i knew the gurl so well
if she was sad i couldn't tell
i missed the point
i missed the signs
so if she's gone the fault is mine

i know
i know a whole lotta things
even though i could list them 1 by 1
she will still be hone

her eyes were blue
her hair was long
in 64 she was born
in baton rouge
her favorite song was in my life
i memorized her every move
i knew her books her clothes
but i paid no attention 2
wat matter'd most

i never asked she never said
when she cried i turned my head
she dre3amed her dreams behind close doors
and that made them easy 2 ignore

i know i know
i missed the forest for the tree's
all i have 2 show when she walked out that door
are cold facts an nothing more
her father's tall her mothers gone
she moved out west when she was 2
the way she laughed the way she loved
on my god what did i do

She think's his name was John

She can accout 4 all the of the men
in her past
where they are
who they married
how many kids they have
she knew knew their backgrounds
family & friends
a few she even talks with now an then
but there is one that never leaves her thoughts

and she thinks his name was John
a chance meeting a party a few years back
broad shoulders an blue eye's
his hair was so black
he was with a friend of a friend u could say
she let his smile just sweap her away
and in her heart she knew it was wrong
but 2much wine and she left his bed at dawn

now each day is one day that's left in her life
she won't know love
have a marriage or sing lullabies
she lays all alone an cries
herself 2 sleep
cause she let a stranger kill her hopes
an dreams
and all her friends say wat a pitty
wat a loss and in the end
when she was barely hangin on
all she could say is she thinks his name was
John

My favorite poem

WELL GUESS WHAT MOTHER FUCKER

How can i trust again

i'm sitting here thinking about wat u did
tryin 2 figure out xactly wat is
see i never know that id be a fool
and let u take control of my
why!
why did u hurt me
why am i here all alone
why did i trust u so far 2 long
how can i love again
when all the love i hav is 4 u
and how can i feel again
with all the drama u put me through
and how can i tryst with all the ly's is hard 2 do
how can i go on
how can i ever fall in love again
how can i ever get 2 feel again
how can i ever get 2 trust u again
i can't go on blaming myself
i don't even want 2 think of loving
anyone but u
i guarantee that u wait an see that
this would never happen again
not 2 me
why did i love u an why did we try 4 so lil
why did i let u in2 my heart
can't blame nobody but myself
i don't want nobody lovin u but me

Still Surving

when i look at u
i feel an emptiness start
but when u eye meets mine
i fall apart
you know what u did
don't u have a heart
but i don't punish u though
because that is when god comes in and plays his part
if it were up 2 me ur life would be over
before it even had a chance 2 start
This is Jazmyne: i'll never forget but in gods eyes i guess i will someday forgive u even though u
don't think it was wrong

Why me

why did u do that 2 me
ur a low life scum
that night i cried my soul free
then u lied like nothin happend
ur so sick
how could u be so desperate
why would u want to rape someone
an make their life a livin hell
would u like 2 feel the pain
what did u gain
nothin
but gettin ur ass in jail

Powerful Emotion

to this day i still wonder wat i did
i loved u so much
how it is all ruined because u wanted 2 touch
i wanted everyone 2 know i was ur gurlfriend
he crept up and began to kiss my inner thigh
i should've screamed but i couldn't say a word
i don't know why it even occured
all i want 2know is why
i then awaited to see wat was 2 come next
u began to go up with ur tongue
why Terry i was only 14 and what u did was wrong
that was just the beginning of the oral sex
u took my virginity at 14
i don't know how u still breath normal human air
and even
can deal with wat u did
i hope u know Terry u took my heart an ripped it
from my chest ur just a munipulating prick who
doesn't take any of the pain himself for wat u did ...........

U Jerk

why did u do it
why did u pick me
why did u have 2 take away my virginity
i was on the ground and bleeding non stop
while u tied me down an laid on top
u pushed ur way
and pain surger through me
makin me cry an bleed heavily
u slapped my face an yelled at me to not move
while u kept right on and made ur own groove
u finished up an kept me tied
got ur clothes on while i cried
u grabbed my face an made me look at u
an told me never 2 tell anyone or u'll be back 4me
u untied me an left u left me 2 cry
and then i realized u hurt my pride
if i ever find u
u won't be around anymore
because ill smack u an hit u
until ur dead on the floor

2night i wanna cry

alone in this house again
i got the tv on the sounds turned down
and a bottle of wine
theres pictures of u an i on the walls around me the way that it was
and should have been surrounds me
i'll never get over u walkin away
i've never been the kind to ever let my feelings show
and i though that bein strong ment never losing self control
but im just drunk enough 2 let go of my pain
2 hell with my pride let it fall like rain from my eyes
2 night i wanna cry
would it help if i turned a sad song on
all by myself would sure hit me hard now that ur gone
or maybe unfold some old yellow lost love letters
it's gonna hurt bad befor it gets better
but i'll never get over u by hidin this way
i've never been the kind 2 let my feelings show
and i thought that being string ment never losing self-control
but im just drunk enough 2 let go of my pain
2 hell with this pride let it fall like rain from my eyes
2night i wanna cry

Nobody knows....

i pretend i'm glad u went away
these 4 walls closin more everyday
and i'm dyin inside
and nobody knows it but me
like a clown i put on a show
the pain is real even if nobody knows
now im cryin inside
and nobody knows it but me
why did i say the things that i needed 2 say
how could i let my angel get away
now my world is just a tumblin down
i can see it so clearly
but ur nowhere around
the nighs are lonely
the days are so sad
and i just keep think about
the love that we had an im missin u
an nobody knows it but me
i carry a smile when im broken in 2
now im nobody without someone like u
im tremblin inside an nobody nows it but me
i lie awake its a courter past 3 im screamin at night
as if i thought u'd hear me
yeah my heart is callin u
and nobody knows it but me
how blue can i get u can ask my heart
but like a jigsaw puzzle its been torn all apart
a million words couldn't say just how i feel
a million years from now u know ill be lovin u still
2morrow morning i'm hittin the dusty roads
gonna find u where ever u might go
i'm gonna unload my heart an hope u come back 2 me
said when the nights are lonely
days are so sad
i just keep think about the lov that we had
an im missing u an nobody knows it but ME

I'm sorry 2 bad

i'm sorry i have feelings
that im a person too
im sorry im not good enough
to be loved by you

im sorry im pathetic
and iv had a perfect life
im sorry you feel this way
im sorry we have to fight

im sorry im unloveable
because of who i am
im sorry i even try
when u know i never can

its really just to bad
that i have to feel this way
i am just another no one
as you can seem to say

im sorry that ur world revolves
around everything but me
im sorry really that i am
that i can't be what u want me 2 be

i wish i were loveable
likeable,respectable
i wish u knew what i cry for
why i'd opened up this door

im sorry that i hate u
even though i really don't
im sorry uou make promisses u say u'll keep but
of course u don't
when u know u really won't

if u only knew what ive been through
how my heart keeps breaking
how my soul is shaking
would u still do the things u do

if onlu u allowed me to talk about it
if you only listened to all of my shit
would u care wat it meant
or just show more resent

i don't know if its because u're selffish
but u know nothin about me
maybe its just who u really are
but at least i try to look past and see

maybe i should just take a knife
slit my wrist and end my life
then at least u would know
how i feel pain yet never show

but the i might be deemed
someone else then who i am
but it happends to me either way
because no one gives a damn

who cares anyway
no one ever does
i do not know wat's wrong with me
that i don't deserve ur love

without anyone else to help
i want to cry and pout to scream
hate myself and wish to die

u have made me into an ugly demon
u have tossed me out into the blue
u hav fuck'd up wat i could have been
u have made me into u

im sorry that this is all
okay with u
im sorry i am
it really is true

i wish u could love me
u know that i do
i will run away from my past
an all because of u

i just wish i could understand
i try really but i guess that i can't
why u choose to be like this
when my hope is fading an i only wish

too bad u'll never know anything
about my existance about my being
too bad i have to feel lonely
while ur dreams coem true an set urself free

too bad u make me hate myself
lost faith in my dreams demolish my health
too bad i hav 2 cry hurt and bleed
and still never find the love that i need

i thought that u might belive in me
i though that u at least tried to see
but i guess i though wrong ur not my daddy
too bad i am still kept always lonely

im so sorry
for all of my shit
i guess i am no one
i guess this is it

i suppose i should yell
stick up for wats true
but if u don't recall
i can't because of u

u say im an adult
and to act like one
but yet i am deprived
of all adult fun

i am just 15
i am not yet grown up
but i try to be smart
but i guess its messed up

i wish i could not always forgive u
not that u ever have or will say sorry
for tearing me down with no xplantion
with out listening to my soul

so wat should i do
just sat that i am through
write out another unread suicidle note
and blame it all on u

A Kiss

u leaned over and u kissed me
i felt my knees get weak
u leaned over an u kissed me
i couldn't even speak
u leaned over an u kissed me
with a passion flowing free
u leaned over an kissed me
sparks flew that we could see
u leaned over an kissed me
a touch so soft an tender
u leaned over an kissed me
a kiss i would remember
u leaned over an kissed me
im sure i kissed u back
u leaned over an kissed me
with the fire no kiss should lack
u leaned over an kissed me
u left me wanting more
u leaned over an kissed me
my soul u did xplore
u leaned over an kissed me
my heart no longer full of pain
u leaned over an kissed me
darling kiss me once more

A love worth waitin 4

i wished upon a star one night
shining brightly above me
i wished upon a 4-leaf clover
growin underneath a tree
each year in june i wished upon a candle glowin bright
i wish upon a shootin star that passed me in the night
i blew away a fallen lash
i whispered in a prayer
that god would send my true love home
for me 2 love and care
with eyes the colour of the sea
and a smile ear 2 ear
he'd hold me in his arms
and defend me from all i fear
a knight in shinning armor is the man he'd try 2 be
i wished for someone to grow old with an walk with hand in hand

U were

Still dream about u
still need u an want u
by my side
all i ever wanted
was u
but u don't see why i want u
ect u see the pain i cry
why did u turn 2 me an say
u loved me
but yet 2 days before our aniversary
u turned an walked away
and i watched my life
run away
now u regret wat u did
well thats wat the say
but i can't stop thinking
about u
and pray u'll come back 2 me
but that doesn't work out the way
we want it 2 be
why can't u see ur the only 1 for me
the 1 i could turn 2 an tell everything
eithout a stutter and look away
u were my world the person i could
turn 2 the most
but now ur gone an will neva
know how i feel................

broken

Seems like just yesterday
You were a part of me
I used to stand so tall
I used to be so strong
Your arms around me tight
Everything, it felt so right
Unbreakable, like nothin' could go wrong
Now I can't breathe
No, I can't sleep
I'm barely hanging on
I'm torn into pieces
Just thought you were the one
Broken up, deep inside
But you won't get to see the tears I cry
I told you everything
Opened up and let you in
You made me feel alright
For once in my life
Now all that's left of me
Is what I pretend to be
So together, but so broken up inside
'Cause I can't breathe
No, I can't sleep
Swallow me then spit me out
For hating you, I blame myself
Seeing you it kills me now
No, I don't cry on the outside
Anymore...

missing u

I love you
I have loved you all along
And I miss you
Been far away for far too long
I keep dreaming you'll be with me
and you'll never go
Stop breathing if
I don't see you anymore
On my knees, I'll ask
Last chance for one last dance
'Cause with you, I'd withstand
All of hell to hold your hand
I'd give it all
I'd give for us
Give anything but I won't give up
'Cause you know,
Been far away for far too long
So far away
I wanted you to stay
'Cause I needed
I need to hear you say
That I love you
I have loved you all along
And I forgive you
For being away for far too long
So keep breathing
'Cause I'm not leaving you anymore
Believe it
Hold on to me and, never let me go
Keep breathing
'Cause I'm not leaving you anymore
Believe it
Hold on to me and, never let me go
Keep breathing
Hold on to me and, never let me go
Keep breathing
Hold on to me and, never let me go

Replaceable

Standing in the front yard telling me
How I'm such a fool - Talking about
How I'll never ever find a man like you
You got me twisted
You must not know about me
I could have another you in a minute
matter fact he'll be here in a minute
I can have another you by tomorrow
So don't you ever for a second get to thinking you're irreplaceable
So go ahead and get gone
And call up on that chick and see if she is home
Oops, I bet ya thought that I didn't know
What did you think I was putting you out for?
Cause you was untrue
Rolling her around in the car that I bought you
Baby you dropped them keys hurry up before your taxi leaves
Standing in the front yard telling me
How I am such a fool - Talking about
How I'll never ever find a man like you
You got me twisted
So since Iâ€™m not your everything
How about I'll be nothing
Nothing at all to you
Baby I wont shead a tear for you
I won't lose a wink of sleep
Cause the truth of the matter is
Replacing you is so easy

Brok'N

I wanted you to know I love the way you laugh
I wanna hold you high and steal your pain away
I keep your photograph, I know it serves me well
I wanna hold you high and steal your pain
'Cause I'm broken when I'm open
And I don't feel like I am strong enough
'Cause I'm broken when I'm lonesome
And I don't feel right when you're gone away
The worst is over now and we can breathe again
I wanna hold you high, you steal my pain away
There's so much left to learn, and no one left to fight
I wanna hold you high and steal your pain'Cause I'm broken when I'm open
And I don't feel like I am strong enough
'Cause I'm broken when I'm lonesome
And I don't feel right when you're gone away
